Headline: #97 Skokie Temporary Reroute at Oakton/St. Louis
ShortDescription: 97 Skokie buses are temporarily rerouted via Oakton, McCormick, Howard, Crawford and Oakton: due to, street blockage near Oakton/St. Louis.
